And(t_front_page.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')OR t_front_page.page_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')OR t_front_page.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')OR t_front_page.module_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%'))
